Introduction

Cho Yubin was the Main Dancer and Lead Vocalist of the girl group Pink Fantasy and its sub-units SHY and Music Daily Doctor under Mydoll Entertainment. She left the group on June 28, 2020, due to a panic disorder. She competed on the show Idol School where she ranked 29th.
